title: Duc Nguyen
text: Mến chào bạn, mình là Duc Nguyen, chuyên đào tạo kỹ năng R để xử lý dữ liệu ở Tự Học R. Mình biên soạn trang blog này để chia sẻ các khuôn code template vẽ đồ thị, xây dựng bảng biểu table trong R cũng như câu lệnh hữu ích thường gặp. Các bạn tham khảo nhé. Cảm ơn các bạn rất nhiều.

title: Boxplot and violin plot
text:
library(ggplot2)

Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.4.3

png(filename = "p1.png",
    width = 6,
    height = 6,
    units = "in",
    res = 300)

ggplot(data = PlantGrowth,
       mapping = aes(x = group,
                     y = weight,
                     fill = group)) +
  
geom_violin(width = 1,
            alpha = 0.2) +
  
geom_boxplot(width = 0.3, 
             color = "black",
             alpha = 0.2)

dev.off()

png 
  2 



1 Tham khảo

https://www.statisticshowto.com/assumption-of-normality-test/
https://r-graph-gallery.com/violin_and_boxplot_ggplot2.html
https://datascience.stackexchange.com/questions/28053/boxplots-or-violinplots

title: Boxplot and violin plot
text:
Code 1bbbaaa

library(ggplot2)

png(filename = paste0(getwd(), "/p1.png"),
    width = 4,
    height = 4,
    units = "in",
    res = 300)

ggplot(data = PlantGrowth,
       mapping = aes(x = group,
                     y = weight,
                     fill = group)) +
  
geom_violin(width = 1,
            alpha = 0.2) +
  
geom_boxplot(width = 0.3, 
             color = "black",
             alpha = 0.2,
             show.legend = F)

dev.off()




Code 2

library(ggplot2)

png(filename = paste0(getwd(), "/p2.png"),
    width = 4,
    height = 4,
    units = "in",
    res = 300)

ggplot(data = PlantGrowth,
       mapping = aes(x = group,
                     y = weight,
                     fill = group,
                     color = group)) +
  
geom_violin(width = 1,
            alpha = 0.2) +
  
geom_boxplot(width = 0.3, 
             color = "black",
             alpha = 0.2,
             outliers = F, # ẩn outlier
             show.legend = F) +
  
geom_jitter(width = 0.1,
            size = 3,
            show.legend = F)

dev.off()




Tham khảo

https://www.statisticshowto.com/assumption-of-normality-test/
https://r-graph-gallery.com/violin_and_boxplot_ggplot2.html
https://datascience.stackexchange.com/questions/28053/boxplots-or-violinplots

title: Chemical trace analysis
text:

References

Meeker, and Bhramar Mukherjee. 2020. “Application of an Analytical Framework for Multivariate Mediation Analysis of Environmental Data.” Nature Communications 11 (1). http://book.thuviencanhan.com/ref/factor_analysis/aung_2020.pdf.
